metadata.name: Sysinternals PsSuspend Suspicious Execution
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious execution of Sysinternals PsSuspend, where the utility is used to suspend critical processes such as AV or EDR to bypass defenses

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('pssuspend.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pssuspend.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pssuspend64.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('msmpeng.exe')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious execution of Sysinternals PsSuspend, where the utility is used to suspend critical processes such as AV or EDR to bypass defenses
